You are the catalyst for what’s next.

Equinix is the world’s digital infrastructure company®, shortening the path to connectivity to enable the innovations that enrich our work, life and planet.

A place where bold ideas are welcomed, human connection is valued, and everyone has the opportunity to shape their future.


LEARN MORE

Shape your environment
Thrive on purpose

Join a company where your work drives meaningful change. Together, we enable innovation that enriches industries, communities, and our planet.

Think boldly

We welcome your unique perspective. Help us challenge assumptions, uncover bias, and remove barriers—because progress starts with fresh ideas.

Feel seen and supported 

You’ll find belonging, purpose, and a team that welcomes you—because when you feel valued, you’re empowered to do your best work. 

Growth powered by you
Your health

Equinix employees receive excellent health care and counseling plans that vary by country to ensure the wellbeing of you and your family. We offer paid vacations and encourage community involvement year-round via volunteer opportunities.

Your family

Spending time with your loved ones and taking care of your family are important. Equinix provides a range of country-specific programs that ensure you have the resources needed to thrive and manage your family’s needs.

Your future

Equinix offers different programs to help you build your financial security, make charitable donations and seek additional education. In many countries we also offer a flexible employee stock purchase plan.


A workplace for everyone

Equinix creates a thriving workplace where we foster belonging for all—where every one of our colleagues is valued and respected for who they are and what they contribute.
